text: magin batahira jyamithiya batahira bhauthika widyawa ha nawathath sambandha kele ya.

inpasu ohuge dewani mudra natyaya wu ‚Äòsawithri‚Äô saha thewanna wu wessanthara jathakaya guwan gatha wiya.1949 wasare guwan widuli shilpin wargikaranayedi mahacharya rathna jankar thuma yatathe pawathi parikshanayen athiwishishta lesa samathwunu ohu guwan widuliye ee shreniye gayakayaku lesa warga kerini.thaman thula athi danuma an ayata bedahada dennata kisidu lobakamak nodakwu chandrasenayan 1951 warshaye desambar 17 wani dina palamu wana maradane ke.di. dewid mawathe chandrasena sangithayathanaya arambaiya.ee thulin kshethrayata piwisi warthamanaye athishayin janapriyathwayata pathwu gayakayin athara, dharmadasa walpola, wiktar rathnayaka, ech.aar. jothipala, nihal nelsan, dhanapala udawaththa, punsiri soyisa pradhana thanak gani.chandrasena sangithayathanayen bihiwu wishishta sangithagnyayin sandaha hondama udaharanaya wanne aacharya premasiri kemadasayan ya. 1953 warshayedi pebarawari 14 wani dina athulathwime gasthu lesa ru. 7.50 ka mudalak gewu kemadasata batanala wadanaya pamanak nowa siyaluma sangitha bhanda wayima igenimata waram labini.pasuwa kisidu gasthuwak aya nokara thama shilpa labadun chandrasenayan guwan widuliye welenda anshaye aadhunika paya meheyawime karyayedi sahayakayaku lesa kemadasa mahatha sahabhagi karawa gaththe ya.

wiwaranata hitiye kuda karya mandalayak.
